bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 802.1Qbf-2011 (Amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2011 as amended by IEEE Std 802.1Qbe-2011, IEEE Std 802.1Qbc-2011, IEEE Std 802.1Qbb-2011, and IEEE Std 802.1Qaz-2011)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2011 specifies localized protection of selected Traffic Engineered Service Instances traversing a common sequence of Provider Network Ports.
This amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2011 specifies localized protection of selected Traffic Engineered Service Instances traversing a common sequence of Provider Network Ports.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
